About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Gday! I'm an Australian developer livng in London. Although I am fairly new the world of coding you'll be hard pressed finding someone who is willing to go above and beyond to meet your needs like me. I am self taught so I understand the importance of hardwork, passion and motivation(something which I have a lot of).
